page.title: 11 Housing in Wellow (cont'd)
page.content: Most properties have been modernised. The cottages lie between large modern estates.These areas leading from Maury's Lane have a few containing bungalows,2 bedrooms,bay windows and garages.Wellow's population grew rapidly in the 1940's when evacuees settled here.The population is increasing as people have found that Wellow is convenient for work. The modern estates are situated around Maury's Lane.They are expensive ,four bedroomed with double garages built of brick and wooden panels. The West Wellow villagers are opinionated about the modernisation. Some believe that there is no longer a neighbourly atmosphere in the now large village.Others think that the increased population boosts business,trade and finance. By S.Balachandra,S.Wright,S.Birnie.
